products.name: BMW 5 Series Sedan
products.descriptions: The BMW 5 series is here with the power to take you farther. Faster. Best-in-class acceleration that sets you drive apart from the rest.

products.name: BMW 6 Series Gran Turismo
products.descriptions: Sophisticated in every respect: The BMW 6 Series stands for elegant and unique design, luxurious comfort and self-assured driving dynamics.

products.name: BMW 7 SERIES SEDAN
products.descriptions: Pure elegance and multisensory entertainment come together in the new BMW 7 Series Sedan to produce an absolute premium driving experience

products.name: THE NEW BMW X7
products.descriptions: The new BMW X7 xDrive40i fascinates from the very first encounter with its combination of uncompromising power, luxurious comfort and expressive design language:

products.name: BMW i7
products.descriptions: The first-ever fully electric BMW i7 combines electric performance and multisensory entertainment to produce an unforgettable motoring experience.
